Title: Pharmacokinetics of tetrabenazine and its major metabolite in man and rat. Bioavailability and dose dependency studies.

Sentece: (+)-[(11)C]DTBZ and [(18)F]FP-(+/-)-DTBZ showed similar brain uptakes and pharmacokinetics, with similar maximum striatum-to-cerebellum ratios (STR/CBL=5.24 and 5.15, respectively) that were significantly better than obtained for [(18)F]FE-(+/-)-DTBZ (STR/CBL=2.55).
Title: Pharmacokinetics of [(18)F]fluoroalkyl derivatives of dihydrotetrabenazine in rat and monkey brain.
Name: Tetrabenazine

Sentece: Striatal distribution volume ratios calculated using Logan plot analysis confirmed the better specific binding for the fluoropropyl compound [distribution volume ratio (DVR)=3.32] vs. the fluoroethyl compound (DVR=2.37).
Title: Pharmacokinetics of [(18)F]fluoroalkyl derivatives of dihydrotetrabenazine in rat and monkey brain.
Name: Tetrabenazine

Sentece: Using the resolved single active isomer of the fluoropropyl compound, [(18)F]FP-(+)-DTBZ, even better specific to nonspecific distribution was obtained, yielding the highest distribution volume ratio (DVR=6.2) yet obtained for a VMAT2 ligand in any species.
Title: Pharmacokinetics of [(18)F]fluoroalkyl derivatives of dihydrotetrabenazine in rat and monkey brain.
Name: Tetrabenazine
